attributes.action: In exchange for 30 years secrecy immunity, make any guilty government members to pay for their crimes in office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In exchange for a 30 year (or more) secrecy for all documentation on creating policy decisions. Any compensation claims or reparations from the estate of victims of any found criminal policy, should come first - directly from the estate of those directly involved in the criminal policy. e.g. 'war crimes' , 'crimes against humanity' and 'collusion or direct involvement in torture'
